comments:
Description:
Fail to create xtab and preview it
Build number:2.3.0.v20071205

Steps to reproduce:
1. New sample data source and dataset from CUSTOMERS.
2. New a cube, two groups. One is Country->State->City, The other is CUSTOMERNAME, measure is CREDITLIMIT。
3. Drag group and measure to xtab and save.
4. Preview

Expected result:
No exception when save the report. Preview is ok.

Actual result:
Save report will throw GUIException
Click Layout preview will throw IllegalArgumentException.

Error log:
